thread.title: Tau’s steel tariff review timelines are too ambitious, says expert
thread.title_full: Tau’s steel tariff review timelines are too ambitious, says expert

author: Linda Ensor
title: Tau’s steel tariff review timelines are too ambitious, says expert
text:
Linda Ensor Parliamentary Correspondent National Tau’s steel tariff review timelines are too ambitious, says expert Minister wants the first set of recommendations by June 2025 B L Premium 17 December 2024 - 11:20 by Linda Ensor
The review of steel tariffs planned by the International Trade Administration Commission (Itac) may take longer than trade, industry and competition minister Parks Tau expects.
The minister said in a recent written reply to a parliamentary question that it was envisaged that the first set of recommendations arising from Itac’s review of the tariff structure for certain steel products would be ready by June 2025. ..
